mapper.select: SELECT a.affiliated_id, e.employee_id AS e_employee_id, e.name AS e_name, e.position AS e_position, e.task AS e_task, e.telephone AS e_telephone, w.work_id AS e_w_work_id, w.code AS e_w_code, w.name AS e_w_name, c.company_id AS c_company_id, c.name AS c_name FROM affiliated a, employee e, company c, work w WHERE a.employee_id = e.employee_id AND a.company_id = c.company_id AND e.work_id = w.work_id ORDER BY a.affiliated_id

SELECT a.affiliated_id, e.employee_id AS e_employee_id, e.name AS e_name, e.position AS e_position, e.task AS e_task, e.telephone AS e_telephone, w.work_id AS e_w_work_id, w.code AS e_w_code, w.name AS e_w_name, c.company_id AS c_company_id, c.name AS c_name FROM affiliated a, employee e, company c, work w WHERE a.employee_id = e.employee_id AND a.company_id = c.company_id AND e.work_id = w.work_id AND a.affiliated_id = #{id}
